几种不同情况下的共线性发生的例子

```{r}
tb1 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y=1:100,z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y,tb1) |> summary()
```

```{r}
tb2 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y=1:100,z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y,tb2) |> summary()
```

```{r}
tb3 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y=c(1:50,100:51),z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y,tb3) |> summary()
```

```{r}
tb4 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y1=c(1:50,100:51),y2=1:100,z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y1+y2,tb4) |> summary()
```

```{r}
tb5 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y1=c(1:50,100:51),y2=100:1,z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y1+y2,tb4) |> summary()
```

```{r}
tb6 <- tibble::tibble(x=1:100,y1=c(1:50,100:51),y2=c(1:50,100:51),z=201:300)
lm(z~x+y1+y2,tb4) |> summary()
```
